value:
$nMPID_比翼クロム|Putting your life on the line to protect
those most precious to you... I think
there could be no greater act of love.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|Having someone to express your love
to is an amazing thing. There IS more
to life than constant battle!

$nMPID_ルフレ男|I made sure to research what
everyone wanted as a gift. It's a
special occasion, after all.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|My sister loved her people. She led
with warmth and benevolence. I plan
on following her example.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|Does Robin like these clothes? I find
them somewhat embarrassing, but he
wears them so well, and so proudly...

$nMPID_ルフレ男|Hello! I come bearing an invitation to
the Day of Devotion, compliments of
$Nf.
$nMPID_比翼クロム|Even fate can be changed by love!

$nMPID_ルフレ男|Hmm... I suppose this is OK, but I
can do better. I just want my strategy
to prove useful to Chrom.
$nMPID_比翼クロム|Urgh. Was I not grateful enough?

$nMPID_ルフレ男|I can feel your love through this. You
are a skillful leader indeed.

I am Chrom of Ylisse. It is my
pleasure to take part in the Day of
Devotion with my companion Robin.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|Phew. Did we get to everyone? I'd
never have guessed that showing we
cared would be so...difficult.$k$pI think I'm more used to swinging a
blade than delivering gifts. I'm more
exhausted than I should be.$k$p$nMPID_ルフレ男|Hmm. Maybe the Shepherds' only
goal isn't just protecting people from
their enemies...$k$pPerhaps their role is also to support
and care for those they protect, so
everyone can live happily, in peace.$k$pAt least...that's what I think...$k$p$nMPID_比翼クロム|Protect not just their lives, but their
happiness as well? I think you may
be on to something, Robin.$k$pIt's a noble goal, ensuring that those
we care for feel supported. I will hold
that in my heart from now on.
Hah!
Take this!
Wagh!
I failed...
A miscalculation...
$nMPID_二人|A token of our thanks!
$nMPID_二人|Let's talk about... Our feelings!
$nMPID_比翼クロム|A gift for you.
$nMPID_ルフレ男|Will this do?
Not very...thoughtful...
Be careful.
Think of the plan.

• "It's the Day of Devotion!"
• "I'm excited!"

• "Lean on me."
• "Always do."
Hm...

• "Who should we give this to?"
• "Let's consider it carefully."
I wonder...
Let's go say hello.
I'm grateful to you.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|There's Lissa, Emmeryn, Lucina,
Frederick... I think we've got gifts
for everyone. Don't we?

$nMPID_比翼クロム|Well, all but one. What would
you like your gift to be, Robin?

$nMPID_ルフレ男|What? Me? You can't just come out
and ask like that, you know. There
are rules!

$nMPID_比翼クロム|You know I don't care about that.
Just tell me what you want.
$nMPID_ルフレ男|Truthfully...I can't think of anything.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|You don't want anything? Aw,
come on. Think of the bind that
puts me in.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|You gave my life meaning when I had
nothing—not even my memory.

The sense of purpose I've found at
your side, working for peace in the
world, is all I could ever ask for.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|You're not alone in that, you know.
I feel the same way.

That's why I wanted to give you
something nice. To show you how
I feel.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|All right, all right. In that case, why
don't you give me one of those
flowers you're wearing?
$nMPID_比翼クロム|It's only going to wilt.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|I'll press it into one of my books.
That way I'll never forget this Day
of Devotion.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|You're too easy to please. If only
Lissa could learn that from you.

Speaking of, I'd better start passing
out these gifts.

$nMPID_ルフレ男|Don't be shy about it, Chrom.
Remember, the whole point of this
is to show your gratitude.

$nMPID_比翼クロム|I know, I know. No need to nag me,
I'm not a child.
$nMPID_ルフレ男|Hahaha...
